overview: Thomas loves Kevin. Kevin loves Thomas. But living under the same roof is not so easy. After a first unhappy experience, they opted for two separate apartments. Dissatisfied, Thomas goes to meet people who will help him to better understand how the couple works: his parents of course, but also his shrink, a specialist of Adam and Eve, his famous Auntie Carla... Will the two lovebirds manage to settle down in the pretty little house with blue shutters they have always dreamed of?
title: Ce sera bien
